lines.text:
[about the kidnapping plan]
Hey wait a minute, wait a minute, what's in it for me?
That's simple. If they want their president back, they have to put things back the way the were.
The Bronx will be back in the hands of the gangs, which means you'll go back to being the number one man for all the big robberies. Instead of hiding out down here, scratching your balls.
Hah! I like scratching my balls.
No sugar you idiot! How many times do I have to tell you, no sugar! It makes me CRAZY!
Who the hell wants to move to New Mexico?
No one will sit on a john... full of dynamite.
[Clark's attempt to escape ends with him staring down the barrel of Strike's shotgun]
You try that again and you'll look like a tea strainer.
A hostage is no good dead. I must be worth something, if they're going through all that much fuss topside.
Then you know who to root for, right mister fucking Clark? Cause if we make it, so do you.
You're worse than they are, Mr. Wrangler.
Allow me to correct you, Mr. Clark - I'm worse than anyone.
If they see us, we've had it!
Leave the Bronx! You are ordered to leave the Bronx!
